long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play AIDungeon with real time translation, it translates in real time the adventure content from native english to the language that you speak.

To make this add-on work you need a working local translation server, this server is written in python and can be found in the following repository: https://github.com/hwpoison/aidungeon-browser-translator
